title: Early Childhood Education Innovation and Teacher Leadership Program: Relationship-Centered Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Over 10 years of secondary education experience, with administrative background in education
context.additional_context: A leadership-focused program conducted at corporate training centers, emphasizing early childhood education policy development and improvements to teacher training systems.

learning_goals: Participants can analyze the historical background and social impact of age-segregated education.
Participants design three practice-based scenarios for building a network among young children, families, and teachers.
Participants develop and apply two types of formative assessment rubrics using digital tools.

resources: Early Childhood Education Case Study Video Library

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
